pages.text: $(li)The End Gate is a dungeon that can be found deep of the caves of the Overworld using the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/end_portal)Ender Eyes$(/l).$(br)$(li)Inside, you will have to go through numerous puzzles that will test your intelligente and determination, to finally reach the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/end_portal)End Portal$(/l).
